name: Advanced Grocery Shop
short_description:

If you want are on a tight deadline and are looking to create Grocery Shop webportal then you should definitely our Script Suitable for you
The Retailer is retina-ready, fully responsive and comes with several features that can make your website easier. our Grocery Shop on this list it offers unlimited catalog mode, user accounts, custom ‘My Account’ section and built-in order tracking.
